schemes.name: Deendayal Antyodaya Yojana – National Rural Livelihood Mission (DAY-NRLM)
schemes.description: Supports formation and strengthening of women's SHGs, livelihood activities, micro-enterprise promotion and financial inclusion.
schemes.benefits: Empowered women SHGs, enhanced livelihood opportunities, financial inclusion and micro-enterprise promotion.
schemes.eligibility: Women Self Help Groups and women collective members registered under NRLM network.
schemes.how_to_apply: Taluk / District Rural Livelihood Mission Offices

schemes.name: Stree Shakti Programme – Karnataka
schemes.department: Department of Women & Child Development, Government of Karnataka
schemes.description: Provides training, financial linkages and entrepreneurial support to women Self Help Groups across Karnataka.
schemes.benefits: Enhanced skills, financial empowerment and entrepreneurial opportunities for women SHGs.
schemes.eligibility: Registered women SHGs functioning under the programme.

schemes.name: PMFME – Women SHG & Group Enterprise Support
schemes.description: Provides credit-linked subsidy, training and marketing support for women SHGs engaged in food processing and value addition.
schemes.benefits: Credit-linked support, training, and market access for women SHGs in food processing and value addition.
schemes.eligibility: Women SHGs, SHG collectives, FPO-aligned SHG enterprises.

schemes.name: Mahila Kisan Sashaktikaran Pariyojana (MKSP)
schemes.description: Promotes skills, sustainable agriculture practices and economic empowerment of women farmers through SHG networks.
schemes.benefits: Skill development, sustainable farming knowledge and economic empowerment of women farmers.
schemes.eligibility: Women farmers enrolled through SHGs & producer collectives.
schemes.how_to_apply: District Rural Livelihood Mission / Implementing NGOs

schemes.name: NABARD – Women SHG Bank Linkage Programme
schemes.department: National Bank for Agriculture & Rural Development
schemes.description: Facilitates credit access, livelihood promotion and enterprise development for women SHGs through bank linkage.
schemes.benefits: Access to credit, support for income generation and enterprise development for women SHGs.
schemes.eligibility: Recognised and active women SHGs linked through banks / NGOs.

schemes.name: Women Entrepreneurship Support – Karnataka Skill & Livelihood Initiatives
schemes.department: Skill Development & Livelihood Department, Government of Karnataka
schemes.description: Provides training, capacity building and enterprise support to women seeking to start agriculture-linked or rural businesses.
schemes.benefits: Training, capacity building and enterprise support for women entrepreneurs in rural and agriculture-linked businesses.
schemes.eligibility: Women entrepreneurs and SHG members enrolled through district centres.
